name: Codeflaws
body:
### [Codeflaws benchmark]
The Codeflaws benchmark consists of 7945 programs in the Codeforces online database. It is a collection of 4085 defects classified across 40 defect classes. It allows comprehensive investigation of the seit of repairable defect classes by various program repair tools.

[Download Codeflaws](http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~release/codeflaws/codeflaws.tar.gz)

### Authors and Contributors
Contact Shin Hwei Tan (@stan6), Yulis (@e0001221) or Sergey Mechtaev (@mechtaev) for questions about the benchmark.

### Support
Supported by ![Tsunami](http://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/~tsunami/default_files/logo.png)
